Table of Contents

Namespace ECCLibrary

Classes

CookedCreatureHandler

Manages the creation of cooked and cured creatures.

CreatureAsset

Override this class to define a new creature. Call the Register() method on an instance to add it to the game.

CreatureDataUtils

Utility methods related to assigning patch-time data.

CreaturePrefabUtils

Utility methods related to constructing a creature prefab GameObject.

CreatureTemplateUtils

Utility methods related to using the CreatureTemplate class more efficiently. An alternative to setting all properties manually.

ECCConfig

Main and only config file for ECCLibrary.

ECCSoundAssets

Holds generic sound assets that are used for creatures in the game.

ECCUtility

Contains various utilities of no particular category.

GameObjectExtensions

Various ECC-related extensions for GameObjects.

SealedCreatureAsset

An alternative to CreatureAsset that does not use inheritance. Supply a template and any needed prefab code.

TrailManagerBuilder

Helps in the creation of a TrailManager. Call the Apply() method to apply the changes.

TrailManagerUtilities

Utilities related to the TrailManager class.

TransformExtensions

Various ECC-related extensions for Transforms.

Structs

CookedCreatureHandler.CookedAndCuredPrefabs

Holds both the cooked and cured version of the creature.

Enums

ECCStringComparison

Enum which is solely used for ECCHelper methods.
